TextView.android:text: Triangular shaped pastry filled with spicy chicken, meat or vegetable.
Pieces of potato spiced with hot and sour tangy spice.
Minced lamb burger fried in butter.
Lamb minced meat burger spiced and dressed with egg net.
Minced and pungently spiced soft skewered rolls grilled in a charcoal oven.
Chicken Tikka, Sheek Kebab and Lamb Tikka gently spiced and grilled over charcoal.
Tender spring chicken marinated in herbs and selected spices then grilled in charcoal clay oven.
Tender cubes of lamb or chicken marinated in spices, then grilled over charcoal.
Salmon marinated in tandoori spices then grilled over charcoal.
Fried king prawn mixed with spiced green chillies and lemon.
Chicken wings marinated in spices, then grilled over charcoal.
Mushroom marinated in fresh garlic, garlic mayo and mixed herbs.
Small pieces of chicken spiced and cooked with hot and sour sauce, covered with pancake.
Mixture of potato, onion, spinach in meduim spices and deep fried.
Pieces of whole king prawn spiced in herbs then grilled in clay oven.
Succulent roasted cubes of prawn cooked in a medium sauce and covered with fried pancake.
Roasted cubes of king prawn cooked in a medium sauce and covered with fried pancake.

Mini pancakes filled with vegetable in a tangi sauce.
Spiced and cooked with bombay potato, covered with breadcrumbs then deep fried.
